extensionDescription.message: Supports platforms such as GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, npm, Docker, etc., with quick navigation by typing in the address bar.

default_platform_info.message: If the input does not contain a platform keyword, this platform will be used by default.

enable_omnibox.message: Enable the address bar shortcut (open + Space)

auto_jump.message: Automatic jump; press Tab to return

enable_dns_intercept.message: Automatically jump when a repository link is detected

advanced_info.message: The following domains or keywords will not trigger automatic jumps.

placeholder_pattern.message: Enter a domain name or keyword (e.g.: localhost)

enter_pattern_error.message: Please enter the address pattern to exclude

omnibox_default_suggestion.message: Enter repository name or package name
